lead_paragraph: Taekwondo's battle for relevance at the Olympics continues at the Rio de Janeiro Games, with tournament organizers introducing colored pants and a mixed martial arts flavor in a bid to spice up the competition.

headline.print_headline: Martial Art Mixes It Up at Rio
headline.main: Martial Art Mixes It Up at Rio
